Docs.summary: Marks APIs that were removed or are unsupported in a given operating system version.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The versionless attribute is primarily used to indicate the API is unsupported for the platform. If a version is specified, the API is only available in earlier versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string platformName) cil managed

Docs.param: The unsupported OS platform name, optionally including a version.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the attribute class for the specified unsupported OS platform.
